params.name: defaultView
params.description: Default view of calendar. The default value is 'week'.

params.name: taskView
params.description: Show the milestone and task in weekly, daily view. The default value is true. If the value is array, it can be ['milestone', 'task'].

params.name: scheduleView
params.description: Show the all day and time grid in weekly, daily view. The default value is false. If the value is array, it can be ['allday', 'time'].

params.name: calendars
params.description: CalendarProps List that can be used to add new schedule. The default value is [].

params.name: useCreationPopup
params.description: Whether use default creation popup or not. The default value is false.

params.name: useDetailPopup
params.description: Whether use default detail popup or not. The default value is false.

params.name: timezone
params.description: Timezone - Set a custom time zone. You can add secondary timezone in the weekly/daily view.

params.name: disableDblClick
params.description: Disable double click to create a schedule. The default value is false.

params.name: disableClick
params.description: Disable click to create a schedule. The default value is false.

params.name: isReadOnly
params.description: Calendar is read-only mode and a user can't create and modify any schedule. The default value is false.

params.name: usageStatistics
params.description: Let us know the hostname. If you don't want to send the hostname, please set to false.

params.name: timezones
params.description: This property will be deprecated. (since version 1.13) Please use timezone property.
